title: [K-12] Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Designing and Operating Interdisciplinary Collaborative Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Program emphasizing team-based project execution and acquisition of reflective practice methods in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three core principles for designing interdisciplinary collaborative online learning spaces
Learners can diagnose online learning environments and derive improvement plans using Design-Based Research (DBR) methodologies
Learners can evaluate collaborative learning processes and suggest improvements using reflective survey instruments
Learners can develop and implement team-based online collaboration strategies for mathematical problem-solving
Learners can use smartphone-based collaborative tools (e.g., Google Forms, collaboration apps) to create project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
